title: MFA statement after attack in Ankara (Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Poland) ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Poland ) We strongly condemn all forms of terrorism. Our thoughts are with the families and friends of the killed and wounded. We would like to pass our deepest condolences to the
